Workaround:

edit the web.xml file in <Aperi-install-dir>\plugins\org.eclipse.aperi.reporting_5.0.0\web\aperi-reports\WEB-INF

and correct the pre-set jdbc-password "YXBlcmk=" 
	<context-param>
		<param-name>jdbcPassword</param-name>
		<param-value>YXBlcmk=</param-value>
	</context-param>

with the actual one copied from tsnmdbparms.properties file (located in <Aperi-install-dir>\devsvr\configuration):
tivoli.sanmgmt.jdbc.dbPassword=<actual-db-password>

This should be done automatically by the installer, so change the bugzilla component to "install"?
Take a look and see if the password update code in the installer is present and working. If its not an installer defect send it back to me...
